title: Alefaa-Bitcon
author: Alefaa-Bitcon
content: It is 25 days before September 21, 2022 and we are happy to announce that the ABTC bounty program for TalkiHero.com has started!!!In order to help you to get more learners, we set the ABTC compensation plan to support you to promote your tutoring lessons:Compensation for the first free trial lesson:We will compensate you ABTC with the same value as your regular price(1ABTC=$10);Compensation for the bulk lessons’ promotion:Any tutors who would have the promotion for 50% off with bulk lessons (5 lessons or more).We will compensate ABTC for the same value that your promotion would have (1ABTC=$10)Please note that we will buy ABTC from the market (starting price is $10) when Alefaa Exchange App is live.Please check also the following links below:Bounty program for learnershttps://drive.google.com/file/d/1Iq-uN03qQNnEPiVTWD5WvXpwcfHYNiAK/viewDiscordhttps://discord.com/invite/mCwM4dfAWmBounty program for tutorshttps://drive.google.com/file/d/1lUSZ7dCUYCZJZ9bflWa5nZHwvBWaG-U7/viewDiscordhttps://discord.com/invite/Dhn3tH7GhtPlease note: You need to submit this application first before your referred tutor is registered on TalkiHero.com.https://forms.gle/q9mbehjFoAiz5aYp8Contact us: info@alefaa.comWebsite: www.Alefaa.com              www.Alefaa.org

comments.author: tingaleunkhontol
